error.message: Class Drupal\recurring_donation\Event\IPNMessageReceivedEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead

The 'recurring_donation' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
